content.text:
# Independence (Kosheen album)

}}
|rev2 = Laut.de
|rev2score =
|rev3 = musicOMH
|rev3score =
|noprose = yes}}
Independence is Kosheen's fourth studio album released on October 1, 2012.[https://www.moksha.co.uk/kosheen/independence-out-011012/ kosheen : independence] The digital copy of the album from iTunes includes two additional instrumentals, 'Zone 10' and 'Zone 15', as well as a remix of their single 'Spies' by Moth Equals.[https://web.archive.org/web/20140711061027/https://itunes.apple.com/gb/album/independence/id564368072 iTunes – Music – Independence by Kosheen]
Track listing
Independence - The Remixes
A limited edition compilation of 8 remixed songs from 'Independence' was released on the 9th of August 2013 by Kosheen.[http://www.discogs.com/Kosheen-Independence-The-Remixes/release/4818855 Kosheen - Independence - The Remixes (CD, Album) at Discogs]
